A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sloppy storytelling with mediocre dialogue. It’s a travesty with what Rian did with Luke Skywalker\, and I’m thankful he didn’t have the chance to meddle with any other iconic characters. The casino scene reminding me of the prequels in fluff\, but even those had fluff with purpose. The casino scene had no rhyme or reason\, or if it did\, it lacked and true connections to the main plot line. I wish this movie never existed.
